articles.title: Russia and NATO weigh in as crisis mounts on Belarus-Poland border - Reuters
articles.description: The European Union accused Belarus on Wednesday of mounting a "hybrid attack" by pushing migrants across the border into Poland, paving the way for widened sanctions against Minsk in a crisis that threatens to draw in Russia and NATO.
articles.content: MOSCOW/BRUSSELS, Nov 10 (Reuters) - The European Union accused Belarus on Wednesday of mounting a "hybrid attack" by pushing migrants across the border into Poland, paving the way for widened sanctio… [+6703 chars]

articles.author: Harry McGee
articles.title: Europe should 'go hard' against UK if Article 16 is triggered, says Ahern - The Irish Times
articles.description: ‘The game is up’: Former taoiseach strongly criticises British government’s negotiating stance
articles.content:
Former taoiseach Bertie Ahern has said that the game is up for British negotiators irrespective of whether or not Article 16 is triggered.
He described the British governments negotiation tactics as… [+727 chars]

articles.description: European diplomats ready for Britain to suspend parts of Northern Ireland Protocol, but claim they have Joe Biden’s support in the row
